page.title: 13LOCAL NEWS - AUCHINLECK
page.content: This is a selection of items from the local newspaper for a week in June 1985. "Project Highhouse" has transformed a pit which once employed 300 miners into a series of six small workshops with an initial combined workforce of about 25. Householders in Auchinleck have been warned to be on their guard against thefts from meters. Coal thefts are still taking place from houses in spite of good weather. Auchinleck Talbot clinched their second trophy within 5 days by beating Kilbirnie in the McEwan's Lager Cup. Local councillor expresses concern at the lack of local men being employed at the new Opencast site at Darnconner.
